name: ThirdRealityGadgets
0:
”Alexa, open third reality”
”Alexa, ask third reality to change the clock format”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: third reality
Developer Terms of Use
des:
1. This skill requires an echo flex to work.

2. This skill requires a Third Reality Smart Clock to work.

3. With Echo Flex plugged into a wall outlet, insert Third Reality Smart Clock into Echo Flex before using this skill. For more details on how to configure and function Echo Flex and Third Reality Smart Clock, please referral to https://tr-common-us-prod.s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/marketing/Smart_Clock_QSG_0521.pdf

4. This skill helps user to change Third Reality Smart Clock to his preferred format (24 or 12-hour clock) vocally.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
